PHRASE.LANG: The Stately Home (Gothic) is the perfect Clubhouse for those people who like the finer things in life with a slightly darker twist. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom (Gothic)" Clubhouse, this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]

Le Manoir (Gothique) constitue le pavillon idéal pour les amateurs de sophistication, avec une touche un peu sombre. Cet espace incontournable comporte de grands et superbes terrains, permettant d’accéder directement à l’espace "Bal masqué – La salle de bal (Gothique)". Il comporte aussi cinq récompenses gratuites. [#Legal]

Das Herrschaftliche Anwesen (Gothic) ist das perfekte Clubhaus für diejenigen, die die etwas dunklere Seite des gehobeneren Lebensstandards zu schätzen wissen. Mit seinen wunderschönen und weitläufigen Außenanlagen und einem direkten Zugang zum "Maskenball - Der Ballsaal (Gothic)"-Clubhaus ist dieser Raum ein absolutes Muss. Dazu gibt es fünf Gratis-Belohnungen. [#Legal]

La casa signorile (gotica) è la clubhouse perfetta per le persone a cui piace il lato più raffinato della vita, ma con un tocco di tetraggine. Il terreno ampio e meraviglioso e il collegamento diretto alla clubhouse "Ballo in maschera - Sala da ballo (gotica)" rendono questo spazio un must. Include anche cinque ricompense gratuite. [#Legal]

El Hogar majestuoso (gótico) es la sede de club ideal para aquellos sibaritas amantes de las cosas buenas de la vida, pero con un toque ligeramente más sombrío. Con su grandísimo y hermoso terreno y un enlace directo a la sede de club del Baile de máscaras: “The Ballroom” (gótico), ¡este artículo es imprescindible! Viene con cinco recompensas incluidas. [#Legal]

The Stately Home (Gothic) is the perfect Clubhouse for those people who like the finer things in life with a slightly darker twist. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom (Gothic)" Clubhouse, this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]
